query.name: com.lsc.ljhs.get_student_by_studentnumber
query.description: Get Student Info by Ticket ID

arg.name: student_number
arg.description: The Student Number of the student

query.sql: SELECT Students.first_name, Students.last_name, Students.lastfirst, Students.student_number, u_def_ext_students9.LSC_DEVICE_ID as device_id FROM Students LEFT JOIN u_def_ext_students9 ON Students.DCID = u_def_ext_students9.studentsdcid WHERE Students.Student_Number = :student_number AND Students.Enroll_Status = 0
